programme.title: Loch Ness
programme.desc: The American scientist Dr. Dempsey, is sent to Scotland on a mission to refute the widespread rumors about the existence of the Loch Ness monster. He's surprised by the hostility of the inhabitants and at the same time he is emotionally attracted to Laura.(n)

programme.title: Some Like It Hot
programme.desc: Desperate to leave town after they witness a murder by the mafia, Joe and Jerry dress up as women to join an all-female band on the way to a job in Florida. But as Joe falls for one of the band's singers, Jerry finds himself the object of affection of a millionaire who is unaware of Jerry's truth.(n)

programme.title: Champion
programme.desc: The story follows the journey of the ambitious boxer Midge Kelly from his humble beginnings until his rise to fame, as he stops at nothing to get what he wants.(n)

programme.title: A Thousand Words
programme.desc: The film revolves within a comedy frame about a skilled literary agent Murphy, trying to reach an oracle to win the authorization to publish his book but the spell backfires and Murphy finds a huge tree has grow in his garden overnight which controls his fate and turns his life upside down.(n)

programme.title: Parasite
programme.desc: The life of an unemployed family living in a poor apartment changes completely when the son becomes the English tutor for the daughter of a wealthy family. As the lives of the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim family intersect, what follows is a web of deceit and disturbing violence.(n)

programme.title: Boyhood
programme.desc: Mason and Olivia are a divorced couple trying to raise their young son, Mason Jr. The film follows the boy's life for twelve years, from first grade at age 6, till the twelfth grade, examining his relationship with his parents all the way through.(n)

programme.title: The American
programme.desc: After he survives an assassination attempt in Sweden, the contract killer Jack flees to Rome where he is hired to build a custom sniper rifle for a client, as he vows that this will be his last job.(n)

programme.title: Casino
programme.desc: Sam Rothstein, director of a gambling club appointed by the mafia to oversee one of its affiliated clubs in Las Vegas during the 1970s to early 1980s, marries Gingerwhos is pampered, arrogant and malicious. Nicky Santoro, a money collector and an executioner of a Chicago mafia gang, is sent to Las Vegas to make sure the mafia gets its share of money for gambling. Many paradoxes occur there.(n)

programme.title: After The Wedding
programme.desc: Isabel runs an orphanage in the Indian city of Kolkata, but she desperately needs money to keep the shelter in place, she travels to New York City to meet a benefactor who might help her with funding.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: After Sonic the Hedgehog comes to Earth, he hides in the town of Green Hills, and is helped by the town's Sheriff to escape the evil Dr. Robotnik who's hired by the government to capture him.(n)

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team race against time after a mission gone wrong.(n)

programme.desc: When a late-night talk-show host is in danger of losing her job, she hires a new woman writer, Molly, to join her only-male writing team. Molly's determination to prove her talent in a male-dominant environment has unexpected results on both Katherine's career and personal life.(n)

programme.desc: The famous physician John Dolittle has the ability to talk to animals, which gives him tremendous potential, as he embarks on an unforgettable journey with his beloved animals.(n)

programme.title: Killerman
programme.desc: Moe (Liam Hemsworth) is a young money launderer, but he suffers from amnesia after a strange accident in a deal that went wrong.(n)

programme.title: John Wick: Chapter 3 - Parabellum
programme.desc: In this sequel, John Wick has killed a member of the High Table, a shadowy international assassin's guild, deeming him an excommunicado (excluded member) and raising a US$ 14 million price tag for his head. A whole world of ruthless hit men and women are pursuing him around every corner.(n)

programme.title: Deadwood: The Movie
programme.desc: As the townspeople gather to celebrate South Dakota's statehood, a clash over land leaves Charlie Utter dead and US Marshall Seth Bullock tries to solve the murder and protect the townspeople from Senator George Hearst.(n)

programme.title: Crypto
programme.desc: Following a demotion, a Wall Street banker manages to find clues that unravel a global conspiracy. As he dives into the layers of corruption taking over New York, he soon finds his career, his life, and his family in peril.(n)

programme.title: Raya and the Last Dragon

programme.title: Angel Falls: A Novel Holiday
programme.desc: Two rivals team up to guide and train a potential writer, and maybe in the process find themselves as they get reintroduced to the true spirit of Christmas.(n)

programme.title: Dolittle
programme.desc: The famous physician John Dolittle has the ability to talk to animals, which gives him tremendous potential, as he embarks on an unforgettable journey with his beloved animals.(n)

programme.desc: When Solomon meets Jennifer sparks fly and they fall head over heels in love. As they decide to get married, their wedding plans are disrupted when they find out that Solomon has liver cancer.(n)

programme.title: Valley Girl
programme.desc: In the golden age of the 1980s, a young man and girl from different social backgrounds try to persuade their parents and friends to stay together.(n)

programme.desc: The story of a young Chinese girl who disguises herself as a male warrior in order to save her father. A journey that sends her into several challenges and threats, urging her to save not only her father but also the honor of her nation.(n)

programme.title: Bad Tales
programme.desc: In this cinematic oeuvre, the film follows the lives of several families residing in the suburban part of Rome, seemingly in an affectionate peace, but eventually, everything crumbles down because of their children. A sweet parable of innocence, morality, and mutual influence.(n)

programme.title: The Rhythm Section
programme.desc: After finding out that her family's death in a plane crash wasn't an accident, Stephanie sets out to take her revenge on those responsible with the help of a former CIA operative.(n)

programme.title: Rocketman
programme.desc: The extraordinary biography of British singer (Sir Elton John), his artistic and professional career which made him one of the most important rock stars in Britain and the whole world, and the hidden aspects of his personal life.(n)

programme.title: Clemency
programme.desc: Having spent years of her life working as a prison warden in a maximum-security prison, Bernadine Williams must question her role when she forms a bond with an inmate who is soon to be executed, forcing her to determine the thin line between good intentions and deadly desires.(n)

programme.title: 22 Chaser
programme.desc: An honest tow truck driver who's struggling to support his family, gets involved in a dangerous game that could cause him to lose everything.(n)

programme.title: I'll Be Next Door for Christmas
programme.desc: Nicky is a 16-year-old girl who lives with her family, who is obsessed with Christmas celebrations. But when her long-distance boyfriend comes for a visit, she hatches a plan to make him avoid seeing her real family and brings a fake one instead.(n)

programme.title: All My Life

programme.title: Valley Girl

programme.title: Date with Love
programme.desc: In a bid to raise his popularity at school, David makes a video asking an actress, Alex Allen, to be his date to prom, which soon goes viral. Desperate for some good publicity, Alex accepts the proposal, only to end up falling for David's teacher.(n)

programme.title: Mulan
programme.desc: The story of a young Chinese girl who disguises herself as a male warrior in order to save her father. A journey that sends her into several challenges and threats, urging her to save not only her father but also the honor of her nation.(n)

programme.title: Winter's Dream
programme.desc: Years after she quit skiing competitively, Kat is asked by a young competitive racer to coach her and hone her skills. Little does she know that the professional opportunity will also bring her love in the form of the racer's widowed father, Ty.(n)

programme.title: Paper Spiders
programme.desc: In the wake of losing her husband, Dawn experiences growing anxiety after she learns that her daughter, Melanie, is moving away for college, after which Melanie attempts to help her mother with her paranoid delusions that threaten to jeopardize their loving bond.(n)

programme.title: Oslo
programme.desc: Based on a true story; a retelling of the negotiations that took place against the backdrop of the Oslo Peace Accords in the 1990s between the Palestinian Liberation Organization and the government of Israel in which Norway acted as an intermediary.(n)

programme.title: The Post
programme.desc: in 1971, Kay Graham (played by Meryl Streep) inherits ownership of the Washington Post newspaper and tries to find her work-life balance while building her confidence as a woman to lead the company. When military analyst, Daniel Ellsburg, decides to expose the truth about the US government's 20 years of clandestine involvement in the Vietnam war that was hidden from the public, he leaks 1000s of pages of classified reports to reporters at the New York Times. The Post race to compete with the New York Times, as its assistant editor tracks Ellsburg and gets a copy of the same reports, but the court issues a restraining order against further publishing. Kay Graham, with the help of the Post editor in chief, Ben Bradlee (played by Tom Hanks), has to decide whether to fight for the freedom of the press by bringing the truth about the war to the light and risk being charged of treason and the closure of her company, or to remain silent and avoid the wrath of the White House.(n)

programme.title: Synchronic
programme.desc: The story follows two New Orleans paramedics whose lives spiral out of control after a designer drug with strange effects causes a series of horrific deaths.(n)

programme.title: S.W.A.T. S4
programme.desc: Sergeant Daniel 'Hondo' Harrelson is conflicted between his cultural identity, and his duty as a police officer, as he’s promoted to team leader to placate the black community, while he and his team continue to put their lives on the line to keep L.A. safe.(n)

programme.title: Succession
programme.desc: With their hands controlling the biggest media company in the world, the Logans remain as dysfunctional as they come, which is made more clear in the wake of the announcement of the family's patriarch that he is stepping down from his position.(n)

programme.title: Vinyl
programme.desc: As the music scene in the 70s expands to include new genres, a struggling record executive tries to survive and rediscover his passion for music as he is forced to face the consequences of past actions and the casualties he left behind on the quest for success.

programme.title: Killing Eve S1
programme.desc: Eve, a bored intelligence officer who dreams of being a spy, finds her deadly match in the talented assassin Villanelle. As the two women become obsessed with each other, they engage in an enthusiastic game of cat-and-mouse that fulfills Eve's fantasies.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S22
programme.desc: In the 22nd season, the squad returns to try to solve the many sexually related crimes in Central Park, while on a personal level everyone on the SVU faces troubles in their own lives.(n)

programme.title: Chicago Med S6
programme.desc: In the sixth season, the staff at Gaffney Chicago Medical Center deals with the aftermath of the global pandemic, while saving patients’ lives and grappling with their own personal problems.(n)

programme.title: Transplant
programme.desc: Bashir Hamed is a Syrian native who took refuge in Canada after the war tore his country apart. As he seeks to put his medical expertise to use in his new country, he struggles to adapt to his new surroundings and faces many obstacles at the hospital where he works.(n)

programme.title: Gentleman Jack
programme.desc: The story of LGBTQ trailblazer Anne Lister who returns to West Yorkshire in 1832 to restore her late uncle's estate and records her relationship with another woman in a cryptic diary.(n)

programme.title: Blindspot S5
programme.desc: After the unfortunate events in Iceland, Jane receives an anonymous message for a dangerous rescue mission, and she has to cooperate with enemies of the past as the final chapter approaches.(n)

programme.title: The Third Day
programme.desc: A man and a woman go on separate trips to a mysterious island off the British coast, Sam who is approached by a group of islanders trying to preserve their traditions, and Helen who is looking for answers on her journey.(n)

programme.title: ZeroZeroZero
programme.desc: As a cocaine shipment makes its way through a perilous journey from Mexico to Italy, the various players from the Mexican sellers, through the Italian mafia buyer to the American brokers, are entangled in a web of betrayal, power struggle and greed.(n)

programme.title: Smuggling in Suburbia
programme.desc: Just as Joanie finds out that she's been unwittingly involved in an illegal operation for smuggling diamonds, federal agents arrest her, whereupon her mother tries to save her.

programme.title: Blindspotting
programme.desc: With only three days left of his probation, Collin is looking forward to starting anew and finding a new job, but his best friend Miles causes some problems and obstacles that endanger their friendship.

programme.title: The Other Wife
programme.desc: Kate's life falls apart when she learns that her husband has been leading a double life. Things get even worse when a mysterious killer goes after her for the money her late husband has stolen from him.

programme.title: The Perfect Catch
programme.desc: A struggling single mother fights to keep her small-town diner afloat. Brought down by a series of disappointments and abandonments, she finds a sliver of hope in the form of an old boyfriend, Chase, who is a professional baseball player who comes to his childhood home after a career disappointment.

programme.title: The Devil Wears Prada
programme.desc: Andrea recently graduated, and aspires to work in a fashion magazine, she accepts to work in one of the most famous magazines, but as a second assistant to the editor-in-chief Miranda, and in order to keep her job, Andrea must impress her tough and demanding boss.(n)

programme.title: Clara
programme.desc: An astronomer obsessed with trying to find evidence of life on other planets, forms an unexpected relationship with an artist that leads them to a massive scientific discovery.(n)

programme.title: The Fault in Our Stars
programme.desc: Hazel and Gus are two teenagers who share an acerbic wit, a disdain for the conventional, and a love that sweeps them on a journey. Their relationship is all the more miraculous given that Hazel's other constant companion is an oxygen tank, Gus jokes about his prosthetic leg, and they met and fell in love at a cancer support group.(n)

programme.title: The Skeleton Key
programme.desc: When the nurse Caroline takes the job of looking after an elderly woman and her ailing husband, she starts to discover that the couple's mansion holds dark secrets involving Hoodoo rituals.(n)

programme.title: Date with Love
programme.desc: In a bid to raise his popularity at school, David makes a video asking an actress, Alex Allen, to be his date to prom, which soon goes viral. Desperate for some good publicity, Alex accepts the proposal, only to end up falling for David's teacher.(n)

programme.title: Wild
programme.desc: With her life in shambles, Cheryl seeks a way out of her downward spiral by going on a solo hike on a journey of self-discovery and reevaluation of priorities.(n)

programme.title: Kinky
programme.desc: Dr. Joyce Carmichael has always been unlucky in love. Despite a successful career, she struggles to maintain a relationship. But when she meets Darrin, their relationship opens the doors of her sexual desires, as the two enter the foray of the world of BDSM.(n)

programme.title: Jinn
programme.desc: When an old family curse starts to haunt Shawn, he finds unlikely sources of help in the form of a shackled mental patient and two strangers who claim to have answers. But the answers he seeks offer no solace as he is forced to go head-to-head with a terrifying force to save his family.(n)

programme.title: Dream House Nightmare
programme.desc: What was supposed to be a lucky purchase for a married couple turns into a nightmare when they discover that their dream house is coveted by an unstable woman who is willing to do anything to force them out.(n)

programme.title: Appetite for Love
programme.desc: When Mina's work sends her back to her hometown, she must contend with old feelings as her encounters with her former sweetheart Clay, whom she is trying to convince to sell his restaurant, stir old feelings for her.(n)

programme.title: Share
programme.desc: When she accidentally discovers a disturbing video from a night she can't remember, 16-year-old Mandy tries to figure out what happened and how quickly everything came down around her.(n)

programme.title: Chocolat
programme.desc: Vianne Rocher (Juliette Binoche) moves with her daughter to the countryside of France, where she opens a chocolate shop. The village women begin to buy her products, which angers the mayor . Meanwhile, a Gypsy band comes to the village , including Roux (Johnny Depp), who falls in love with her.(n)

programme.title: Moulin Rouge!
programme.desc: As a young writer seeking his fortune in the aftermath of the Bohemian revolution tries to get his play picked up by the owner of the Moulin Rouge, he finds himself involved in a dangerous love affair with star courtesan Satin who is coveted by the wealthy Duke of Monroth.(n)

programme.title: Cold Mountain
programme.desc: Inman meets Ada in Cold Mountain,where they fall in love. He gets assigned military duty to serve during the Civil War, changing their lives completely. Ada struggles with hardship and hunger, and he fights for his life everyday. She writes to him, asking him to come back to her, and he decides to leave the military and makes his way back on a journey more difficult than they imagined.(n)

programme.title: Land of the Dead
programme.desc: In a world taken over by the living dead, the remaining survivors live in a walled city under troubling leadership. Riley, who commands an armored vehicle to protect the city, faces the challenge of investigating the zombies turning into more advanced creatures as a revolution brews in the city.(n)

programme.title: When Margaux Meets Margaux
programme.desc: A 45-year-old woman named Margaux finds herself in an unexpected situation, where she meets a younger version of herself face to face.(n)

programme.title: Unleashing Mr. Darcy
programme.desc: A modern-day Pride and Prejudice that sees Elizabeth Scott clashing with Donovan Darcy at a dog show after his attitude rubs her the wrong way. Despite sharing a mutual attraction, their relationship goes downhill as a series of misunderstandings ensue, until they get a real look at each other.(n)

programme.title: The Rich Man's Wife
programme.desc: José Potenza, an unhappy wife and an alcoholic, is married to Tony Potenza. Feeling upset and angry, she goes to the bar and gets to know Cole Wilson, a former criminal. When he knows her story, he suggests killing her husband in order to inherit his massive wealth.(n)

programme.title: Ricki and the Flash
programme.desc: Rock star Ricki (Meryl Streep), gave up everything for her dream of rock-and-roll stardom, is now returning home to make things right with her family.(n)

programme.title: Misery
programme.desc: When the famous novelist Paul Sheldon has an accident, his life spirals out of control. Nurse Annie Wilkes takes him to her remote house, but Sheldon gradually discovers that she is an obsessed fan of his works, and she is only torturing him slowly to get him to write her stories.(n)

programme.title: Escaping the NXIVM Cult: A Mother's Fight to Save Her Daughter
programme.desc: After Catherine Oxenberg finds out that her daughter, India, has joined the NXIVM cult headed by Keith Raniere and Allison Mack, she does whatever it takes to extricate her daughter from their inflicted mental and physical abuse.(n)

programme.title: The Secret of Kells
programme.desc: Little Brendan lives far away under the siege of barbarian raids during the Middle Ages. But a new life of adventures begins when a famous master illuminator arrives, bringing with him an unfinished ancient book full of wisdom and secrets.

programme.title: Pirates in Callao
programme.desc: Alberto, gets lost on a school trip to a fort called El Real Felipe in Callao, and he enters a portal that sends him to the 17th century. He discovers that Dutch pirates will attack Callao under Jacques L'Hermite, who wants to steal the king's gold and invade Callao.

programme.title: Black Sheep Smile
programme.desc: As Grumbo shoulders the responsibility of putting a weird theory to practice, Fancy, Chloe, and Victoria resent those attempts. Grambo pulls out all the stops to prove correct.

programme.title: Mamma Mu och Kråkan
programme.desc: Mama Moo is an ordinary cow living a typical life, but she dreams to go on an adventure. When she meets Crow, she tries to get close to him, but he doesn't reciprocate the feeling.(n)

programme.title: Boonie Bears: The Wild Life
programme.desc: With a new theme park called Wild Land having a million-dollar-prize contest, Vick takes part in it, only to find himself facing trouble when the visitors turn wild after they are transformed into animals.(n)

programme.title: Kurt Turns Evil
programme.desc: Kurt discovers that society doesn't appreciate forklift operators. When he finds everyone around him has respectable jobs, he decides to turn to a life of crime and become vicious.(n)

programme.title: Micropolis
programme.desc: Micropolis is the theme park that the Mongoose call home. It's peaceful and idyllic, until it comes under fire when Rascal, the leader of the shrews, sets his eyes on it and attempts to kill its inhabitants to seize control.(n)

programme.title: Hokus pokus Albert Åberg
programme.desc: Seven-year-old Albert, wants to convince his father that he's old enough to get a dog and uses the help of a magician to change his mind.(n)

programme.desc: Marvin wants to leave the farm because he doesn't feel loved by those around him. His friend Grumbo gets a new job in the city's aquarium. Will Marvin leave with Grumbo, or will the others change their minds and get them to stay.(n)

programme.desc: Marco Macaco works as a beach officer and loves the beautiful Lulu, who's fascinated by Marco's rival, Carlo, who builds a gigantic monkey-shaped casino on Marco's beach. Marco discovers Carlo's evil plans and tries to stop him.(n)

programme.title: Moomins and the Comet Chase
